name: Plastic for Dinner
description:
This is my global project for Welsh Baccalaureate aimed to raise awareness of plastic pollution in the oceans.

Play in fullscreen to experience properly.

RULES

  • Eat as much algae as you can without being killed by shrimp or plastic
  • Eating plastic will make your health go down
  • Eating algae will make it go up
  • If you eat enough algae you can charge up a 'boost' ability which allows you to go fast for a short period of time, and is helpful for escaping predators.
  • Hold down the left mouse button to move in a particular direction.
  • Hold space to boost - amount of boost is indicated by the green bar at the bottom of the screen.
